bill_title: exempt certain wind farms from taxation if located in an Indian reservation on land held in trust by the United States.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt certain wind farms from taxation if located in an Indian reservation on land held in trust by the United States. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-35 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any company owning or holding under lease, or otherwise, real or personal property used, or intended for use, as a wind farm producing power is exempt from the taxes imposed by §§ 10-35-18 and 10-35-19 and ad valorem taxation imposed pursuant to chapter 10-35, if the property is located within the exterior boundaries of an Indian reservation on land held in trust by the United States. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
